title: Lovesick: Los Angeles 2016
desc: Lovesick Expo has been representing the unrepresented in the wedding world for 6 years running! Along with our partners at the world's largest alternative wedding resource? Offbeat Bride , we are once again uniting the best wedding talent across the country and the people who need them the most! This is the wedding show for the good people who would never go to your typical "bridal show." Not to mention, booze, burlesque, and other fun surprises in each city!
